channel.title: Pascal's Digital Garden
channel.description: Last 10 notes on Pascal's Digital Garden

item.title: digital garden iCloud sync to git
item.description: public zettelkasten-sync This is a tool that keeps the git repository for my Zettelkasten in sync with the current state in the iCloud.

item.title: Odysseus Vertrag
item.description: public Man legt sich selbst bestimmte Regeln auf, um sich vor unerwünschten Verhalten, durch z.B. Irrationalität oder Impulsivität, abzuhalten.

item.title: homelab - traefik
item.description: public Reverse proxy for routing to all services that are not in the kubernetes cluster.

item.title: homelab - nexus
item.description: public Link: nexus.pwlab.dev The following repositories are installed: Docker A docker (OCI) repository for docker images.

item.title: homelab - FORUM0
item.description: This is a mini PC of type Minis Forum Venus Series UM773. The following sections give an overview about the deployed software components.

item.title: SSL - TLS - Handshake
item.description: public Clear handshake overview Detailed handshake The following graph includes authentication with CA Details on how SESSION MASTER KEY is created.

item.title: Terminal shortcuts
item.description: Ctrl+x then Ctrl+x: Toggle between current position and start of line Ctrl+w: Cut the word before the cursor Option+d (Alt+d): Delete the word after the cursor .
